MEN'S
Backpacks

Backpacks Men

Pack some style with AJIOs cool collection of backpacks for men . Whether its to carry a laptop to work or for convenient luggage for travelling, find the perfect design from backpack brands such as Wildcraft and United Colors of Benetton , besides AJIOs own brand.

Backpacks for travel

Every individual has different requirements when it comes to a backpack for travelling . +

Some like it light and small for a few books or a change. Others prefer backpacks that replace bags and can expand to fit shoes , clothes and other essentials. Whatever you need, AJIO has a wide range of backpacks for travel from which you can find one that suits you.

Backpacks for work

When you are carrying it to work, a backpack needs to be as stylish as it is functional. Pick laptop backpacks with adjustable straps to distribute the weight better. Look smart and executive-like holding a laptop messenger bag . From stylish textures to colourblock and contrast taping, you will find modish options for backpacks for work from Flying Machine , Muddman and other brands.

Backpack brands

From rugged everyday backpacks that are comfortable and convenient, to stylised options with army-inspired accents, buckle straps , zipper pockets , padded shoulder straps and other unique detailing, you will find the best backpacks for work and travel in the online collection on AJIO. Browse through to see the trendiest options from brands, including Skybags , Wrangler and FILA .

    BUY MEN'S BACKPACKS ONLINE

    Add cool touches to your everyday outfits with stylish mens accessories! To help you out, AJIO has put together a range of cool backpacks for men in a myriad of sizes, styles, prints and patterns. Go ahead and get browsing to find the right fit for you. We have bags of every kind for every personality!

    To complete your casual looks, and to carry your things in style, take a look at our everyday backpacks for men. Spacious and portable, you can pick your choice from our wide range. We have everything from deck backpacks to portable campus bags. For a funky look, check out our printed backpacks. For a hipster effect, browse through our canvas backpacks. Get minimal with our trendy colour block backpacks. Quirky dino prints, cool camouflage prints, trendy graffiti prints and many others are available for your choosing!

    Your work attire can take on a trendy new look if you play right with your accessories. We have some charming laptop backpacks for you to carry with your office outfits. Offering a peppy colour palette, colour block patterns, smart styling and more, these laptop bags are bound to have you stepping out in style.

    Travellers have their own needs and we know that very well. We have chosen a range of travel backpacks and rucksacks for the new-age traveller. Spacious and sturdy, these are also equipped with convenient slots and pockets for all your things. For every kind of traveller, there is an option on AJIO. Sturdy rucksacks for the backpacker, canvas rollover rucksacks for the camper, camo print cycling backpacks for the cycling enthusiast and many more! Just browse through.

    For your specialised needs and unique requirements, we have a stylised section too. From training backpacks with padded shoulder straps to canvas messenger bags, we have plenty of options. We offer barrel bags for a blend of space and style, canvas messenger backpacks to add a hint of minimal fashion and many other interesting styles.

    From suave solids and textured looks to abstract designs and graphic prints that pop, you will be spoilt for choice in terms of looks too. As for brands, we have some of the coolest accessory brands for men offering their best picks. Puma delights with its cool designs, comfortable styling and signature logo. Wildcraft is the brand for the outdoorsy person and the adventure lover and its backpacks speak of that. Famozi has a collection of bags that sport minimal design with maximum style. Our very own AJIO has an uber-trendy range of backpacks in every style possible.

    Browse through all these brands and many more with AJIO!
